name: Simple 1500 Series Vol. 82: The Sensuikan
overview: Simple 1500 Series Vol.82 - The Sensuikan is a radio control submarine simulator that features a story mode in which the player takes the role of a young kid that buy a new radio control submarine and will have to pass several stages against other users to gain more money that will allow him to improve his submarine or buy new ones in the town shop. The gameplay uses the 2 analog sticks to control the submarine, and to clear each stage the player have to pass some trials. If he succeeds, he can get to the town shop and buy new items, or go to the next stage.
